task.title: Completing Data Screens
task.shortdesc: Once you have created your project in Acme Eye, complete data screens, including Acme Prime and Customer.

context.p: To complete the Acme Prime data screen, follow these steps:

step.cmd: From the Document Outline, select Acme Prime.
step.info: The Acme Prime data screen is displayed.

step.cmd: Enter your Acme Prime information, as follows. Figure 4-1 shows an example of a completed Acme Prime data screen.

fig.title: Figure 4-1: Completed Acme Prime Data Screen

example.note: Acme Eye marks required fields with a red asterisk (*). This means you must fill in the information in the fields marked with a red asterisk (*) or you cannot move to the next screen.
